install.name: aiRedirectWww
install.author: Alex Dobrin
install.copyright: Copyright (C)2011 Alex Dobrin. All rights reserved.
install.description: A plugin to redirect the page to the domain with or without www.

field.name: check_localhost
field.label: Check localhost
field.description: Redirect the page only if the page is not accessed through localhost.

field.name: with_www
field.label: Redirect to WWW
field.description: Redirect the page to the domain with wwww.

field.name: redirect_site
field.label: Redirect
field.description: Select when to redirect the page.

field.name: cookie_lifetime
field.label: Cookie life time
field.description: Number of seconds the value of noaiwww ( deactivate the plugin ) is remembered in a cookie.
